    • getByIdWatchlist

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<Securitysplit> getByIdWatchlist(Integer idWatchlist)
      Retrieves all split events for securities in the specified watchlist.
      Parameters:
      idWatchlist - the ID of the watchlist whose securities’ split events are fetched
      Returns:
      a List of Securitysplit entities for the given watchlist

    • getByIdTenant

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<Securitysplit> getByIdTenant(Integer idTenant)
      Retrieves all distinct split events for securities held in any portfolio of the specified tenant.

      Combines splits via:

      • portfolio → securitycashaccount → transaction → security → securitysplit
      Filters by tenant ID and orders by security‐currency ID and split date ascending.
      Parameters:
      idTenant - the ID of the tenant whose portfolios’ security splits are fetched
      Returns:
      a List of distinct Securitysplit entities for the given tenant

    • getSplitFactorAfterThanEqualDate

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) Double getSplitFactorAfterThanEqualDate(Integer idSecuritycurrency, Date date)
      Calculates the cumulative split factor for a security after the specified date.

      Uses logarithmic summation to multiply individual split ratios:

      • to_factor / from_factor for each split
      • only includes splits with split_date > the given date
      Rounds the result to one decimal place.
      Parameters:
      idSecuritycurrency - the ID of the security‐currency for which the factor is computed
      date - the exclusive lower bound for split_date
      Returns:
      the cumulative split factor as a Double, or null if no splits match

    • getByIdSecuritycashaccount

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<Securitysplit> getByIdSecuritycashaccount(Integer idSecuritycashaccount)
      Retrieves all distinct split events for securities that have transactions on the specified security account.

      Joins:

      • securityaccount (alias sa)
      • transaction (alias t)
      • securitysplit (alias sp)
      Filters by security account ID and orders by security‐currency ID and split date ascending.
      Parameters:
      idSecuritycashaccount - the ID of the security account whose related splits are fetched
      Returns:
      a List of distinct Securitysplit entities for the given security account
